public ref class PrintProperty abstract : IDisposable, System::Runtime::Serialization::IDeserializationCallback

summary.span: 表示打印系统硬件或软件组件的属性（和属性的值）。

span.span: Represents a property (and the value of the property) of a printing system hardware or software component.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此类在运行时发现类型的打印系统对象，这些属性，而无需使用反射。The following example shows how to use this class to discover at run time the properties, and the types of those properties, of a print system object, without using reflection. [!code-csharp[GetPrintObjectPropertyTypesWithoutReflection#ShowPropertyTypesWithoutReflection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GetPrintObjectPropertyTypesWithoutReflection/CSharp/Program.cs#showpropertytypeswithoutreflection)] [!code-vb[GetPrintObjectPropertyTypesWithoutReflection#ShowPropertyTypesWithoutReflection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GetPrintObjectPropertyTypesWithoutReflection/visualbasic/program.vb#showpropertytypeswithoutreflection)]

param.name: attributeName
param.span: 此对象表示的属性的名称。

span.span: The name of the property that this object represents.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `attributeName`应拼写打印系统对象，包括大小写的某些特定属性的名称完全相同。The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular property of a print system object, including casing. 例如，属性"QueuePort"，未列出"PrintPort"、"Port"或"Queueport"必须拼写对象。For example, the property of a object must be spelled "QueuePort", not "PrintPort", "Port", or "Queueport".

summary.span: 释放正在由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources that are being used by the .

Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (A_0 As Boolean)

summary.span: 释放正在由 使用的非托管资源，也可以选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are being used by the and optionally releases the managed resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法未命名的布尔参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the unnamed Boolean parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`参数设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with the parameter set to `false`. 布尔参数时`true`，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the Boolean parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
